Censure Devils.name: Censure Devils
Censure Devils.flavor: The power of your faith pains your diabolical enemies.
Censure Devils.channelDivinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter
Censure Devils.onHit: The target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Ensnaring Smite.name: Ensnaring Smite
Ensnaring Smite.flavor: You bind your foe with ancient magic used to imprison devils.
Ensnaring Smite.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn. If the target is a devil marked by you, it takes 1[W] extra damage and can’t teleport (save ends).

Heavenly Courage.name: Heavenly Courage
Heavenly Courage.flavor: Honeyed words and malicious threats have no effect on you but bring punishment to your foes.
Heavenly Courage.trigger: You fail a saving throw against a charm or fear effect
Heavenly Courage.effect: You reroll the saving throw. If you save, the enemy that caused the charm or fear effect takes radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Blessing of the Chalice.name: Blessing of the Chalice
Blessing of the Chalice.flavor: Invoking the power of your order’s oath, you infuse your blade with holy light to thwart your enemy.
Blessing of the Chalice.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends). If the target is a devil, it also takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).
Blessing of the Chalice.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
